org.elasticsearch.painless

Class AnalyzerCaster

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.painless.AnalyzerCaster

  • public final class AnalyzerCaster
extends java.lang.Object
    Used during the analysis phase to collect legal type casts and promotions for type-checking and later to write necessary casts in the bytecode.

    • Method Summary
